comment: Smart Data Models - Mapping of ACRIS data model CheckpointFacilityOperatorParty adapted to DTDL from smartdatamodels.org. Source: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.ACRIS/master/CheckpointFacilityOperatorParty/schema.json

contents.name: Name
contents.comment: Unique name of the Operator Party for the Checkpoint Facility.
